resources.string: Copacabana is located in the North of Medellin, in the Valle de Aburrá, one of the 9 regions which is composed cultural and geographically Antioquia. It borders with de San Pedro at the north, with Girardota at the east, with Bello at west Occidente and with Guarne and Medellín at south.
Nuestra Señora de la Asunción church
The first church in Valle de Aburrá

Este templo de estilo español fue construido en bloques de piedra por el padre Carlos Mejía en 1870. En los años 40 se le adosó la torre lateral con campanario y reloj. Tiene tres naves y ménsulas en madera con aplicaciones doradas. Alberga el retablo de Nuestra Señora de Copacabana, una de las imágenes más apreciadas por los feligreses, y la escultura de la Virgen de la Asunción, patrona del Municipio, entronizada en 1790.

The Capilla del Calvario has oil painting of the Virgen de Chiquinquirá, de Guadalupe, Jesus on the cross and María Auxiliadora. It has a beatufil patio with 7 stoned plaque wich were settled in 2009 with reason of the 350 years of the church.
Tuesday to Thursday: 19:00 - 24:00, Friday yo Saturday: 19:00 - 1:00, Sundays: 19:00 - 24:00
Monday to Thursday: 12:00 - 24:00, Friday yo Sunday: 12:00 - 1:00

It is located in the Ancón vereda, 3 killometers from the town and 14 from Medellín, on the Autopista Norte. It has 16 hectare of green zones with paths for enjoy the nature. It has also lakes, streams, waterfalls, trees and gardens. It offers swimmingpools, sledges, soccer fields, tennis and basketball, restaurants and shops.
Headquarter of the Juegos Suramericanos 2010 for waterpolo. It has an olimic swimmingpoolfor internationals competitions.
Nearby there is a soccer field.
In 1968 started its construction by padre Jesús Bernal Vélez, priest of Copacabana
It is recommended to take the path through Cristo Rey, then you can enjoy the nature.
Copacabana has 66.665 inhabitants(DANEs data from June 30th, 2011).
The principal economic activities are: industry, dressmaking and agriculture
San Juan de la Tasajera Church
It is located 2 kilometers from the town. It is beautifil. It was built in the 60s.
Monday to Thursday: 14:00 - 22:00, Friday to Saturday: 13:00 - 23:30, Sundays: 12:00 - 22:00
Monday to Thursday: 8:30 - 21:00, Friday to Sunday: 8:30 - 22:00
